page.title: 10MEDIA & COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Regarded as luxury by town dwellers, isolated rural houses need {telephones which can connect you to anybody in Britain or abroad.For those few with- out,a public callbox is situated out- side Denton Post-Office,as is the Post box.Letters can also be posted in a rare Victorian{post-box}at the top of Norwich Road.There are 2 collections weekdays,but only 1 delivery.All homes have a{paper}delivered,most popular is the "Eastern Daily Press".The majority have the Parish Magazine which covers all aspects of life for Denton & Alburgh.2 households do not have television,some up to 4:10% have video recording machines.All have{radio}for newsgathering and entertainment.Some have short-range(Citizens Band)radio for sending & receiving messages.
